summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2151 for the improvement of Eastern Avenue, from North Fiftieth Street to Pacific Place; and Pacific Place, from Eastern Avenue to a connection with the present sewer on Pacific Place and North Thirty-seventh Street, all in the City of Seattle, by the construction of sewers therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all necessary wyes, openings, manholes, flush tanks, catch basins, and their appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district, under Ordinance No. 21610, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
